fileSystem.label: Multi Criteria Analysis
fileSystem.desc: This Story Map details the data-driven process of solving workload imbalance by redistricting the City of Mesquite inspector boundaries based on results from a Multi-CriteriaAnalysis.

fileSystem.label: UAS In Local Government
fileSystem.desc: A presentation given to the 2018 Texas Public Works Association Education Seminar that details some of the major UAS projects undertaken at the City of Mesquite, such as erosion monitoring, traffic studies, and engineering design.

fileSystem.label: ${Web AppBuilder Widgets: MultiFilter}
fileSystem.desc: The MultiFilter addresses limitations with the native Group Filter Widget by allowing multiple group layer filters to be applied to the web map at one time and allowing the creation of complex queries for each layer within a group.

fileSystem.label: ${Web AppBuilder Widgets: StreetView}
fileSystem.desc: While attending a meeting with city personnel, I noticed our engineers would frequently leave our Web Infrastructure Map to open Google Street View. This process was not only cumbersome, but also distracted from the meeting. The StreetView widget was created to seamlessly transition from a Web AppBuilder instance to Google Street View.

fileSystem.label: ${Python Geoprocessing Tool: Asbuilt Record Locator}
fileSystem.desc: This Python Geoprocessing Tool uses the ArcPy Python library to automate a frequent GIS task - finding and delivering asbuilts for customer requests. When benchmarked against a request that previously took a day's work, this script was able to provide a 30-minute turnaround.

fileSystem.label: ${GitHub}
fileSystem.desc: Checkout my GitHub and follow MarkOS and other projects.

parameters.softwareBodyTemplate:
Mark Buie

www.markbuie.com

Please contact for full resume

DID YOU REALLY THINK I WOULD
Put my personal infor here?
Come on give me some credit!

Give me a ring at
214 267 8433

EDUCATION

The University of Edinburgh
Master of Science (MSc),
GIS & Archaeology

Edinburgh, Scotland, UK
2014 – 2015

Texas A & M University
Bachelor of Arts (BA),
Anthropology

College Station, Texas
2005 - 2009

EXPERIENCE

The City of Mesquite
GIS Coordinator
October, 2016 – July, 2019

  • Managed the GIS Drone Program which has helped departments tell their story, increase productivity, and reduce expenditures. The success of this program has prompted a citywide UAS Department.
  • Developed web GIS applications using the ArcGIS API for JavaScript and extended the functionality of Web AppBuilder with custom Widgets and Python Geoprocessing Tools.
  • Administered ArcGIS Enterprise (ArcGIS Server, ArcSDE, AGOL, and Portal), including managing Users and Roles, publishing REST services, spatial views (T-SQL), scheduling stored procedures, and installing / troubleshooting Esri software.

The City of Mesquite
GIS Technician
April, 2016 – October, 2016

  • Introduced new technologies and analytical methodologies, such as implementing the use of UAS / Drone remote sensing technologies to reduce the cost of engineering project design by 30%.
  • Solved workload imbalance for Environmental Code Officers by performing a Multi-Criteria Analysis, using Python and R, to redistrict patrol areas.
  • Generated additional revenue for capital improvements by assisting the Finance Department with the development of a GIS based method for calculating Drainage Utility District (DUD) fees.

The University of Edinburgh
Research Assistant
May, 2015 – January, 2016

  • Developed curriculum in Python programming and UAS photogrammetry for a master’s course in Remote Sensing, and taught undergraduates Spatial Analysis and relational databases (MySQL).
  • Awarded Moray Endowment Fund to continue research in UAS Aerial Mapping for archaeological surveys, in Iceland.

HDR and other companies
Archaeologist / Logistics Coordinator
May, 2011 – August, 2014

  • Supervised teams of archaeologists for multiple surveys and provided logistics for the Deepwater Horizon Coastal Cleanup Effort.
  • Commended for effective communication, problem solving, and quality of scientific reports.
